title: Hotel Sai Palace
sneakPeek: Famous for its vegetarian fine dining.
details:
-Located centrally on K.S. Rao Road.
-Known for three premium restaurants.
-Serves excellent North & South Indian Thalis.
-A top choice for families and hygiene.
-Close to major city shopping hubs.

title: The Ocean Pearl
sneakPeek: Luxury dining and premium buffets.
details:
-Home to the legendary 'Sagar Ratna'.
-Famous for authentic vegetarian Thalis.
-Features 'Coral' for seafood and buffets.
-Ideal for business and family gatherings.
-Located in the heart of Kodialbail.

title: AJ Grand
sneakPeek: Premium hotel with a pool-side barbecue.
details:
-A luxury business hotel located near Bunts Hostel.
-Features 'Bistro', a 24-hour coffee shop, and specialized fine dining restaurants.
-Known for its lavish buffets and elegant interiors.
-Offers a great view of the city and premium staycation facilities.

title: Chutney
sneakPeek: Authentic vegetarian favorites at Deepa Comforts.
details:
-Located within the Hotel Deepa Comforts complex.
-Famous for its vast variety of dosas and South Indian breakfast items.
-The ambiance is modern yet traditional, perfect for a quick, high-quality meal.
-A favorite breakfast spot for locals and tourists alike.

title: Machali
sneakPeek: The ultimate destination for seafood lovers.
details:
-A legendary spot located behind Hotel Ocean Pearl.
-Famous for its Fish Thali and Ghee Roast dishes (Squid, Prawns, Anjal).
-The food is served on banana leaves, adding to the authentic coastal experience.
-Always crowded, so expect a wait, but the food is worth it.

title: Giri Manja's
sneakPeek: Iconic old-house style seafood joint.
details:
-Located near Car Street in an old heritage house.
-Famous for its home-style Fish Thali and the spicy Anjal Tawa Fry.
-The atmosphere is rustic and nostalgic, feeling like a meal at a grandmother's home.
-A must-visit for anyone wanting the true taste of Mangalorean seafood.

title: Naadu
sneakPeek: Authentic coastal flavors in a rustic setting.
details:
-Known for bringing traditional village-style cooking to the city.
-Specializes in Kori Rotti, Chicken Sukka, and Neer Dosa.
-The ambiance reflects the culture of 'Tulunadu' with earthy decor.
-A great place to try local delicacies that are hard to find elsewhere.

title: Snuggles Roastery
sneakPeek: Cozy vibes and artisanal coffee.
details:
-A hidden gem for coffee enthusiasts in Mangalore.
-Known for its warm, 'snug' interiors and excellent roasted coffee blends.
-Offers a great selection of desserts and light bites.
-Perfect for a quiet evening date or reading a book.

title: Pabbas Ideal Cafe
sneakPeek: Legendary ice cream makers in Mangaluru.
details:
-A cozy place for relaxation and world-class Tiramisu.
-Pabbas is an ice cream parlour in the city of Mangalore, Karnataka, India.
-It is an outlet of the parent brand Ideal Ice Cream, and consistently listed as one of the must visit places when in or around Mangalore.
-The flavours of ice cream at Pabbas include the Gadbad, Pabbas Special and Tiramisu.

title: Ideal Cafe
sneakPeek: The vegetarian heart of the Ideal Ice Cream empire.
details:
-Located in Hampankatta, distinct from Pabbas, focusing on pure vegetarian snacks and ice creams.
-Famous for the 'Machine Gun' and traditional 'Mysore Masala Dosa'.
-A nostalgic spot for locals, operating since 1975.

title: Diesel Cafe
sneakPeek: A chic, aesthetic cafe known for pancakes and pasta.
details:
-One of Mangalore's most 'Instagrammable' cafes with beautiful interiors.
-Famous for its all-day breakfast, especially fluffy pancakes and waffles.
-Offers a wide range of continental dishes, burgers, and thick shakes.

title: Brio Cafe & Grill
sneakPeek: Rustic vibes with all-day breakfast and grills.
details:
-A charming cafe in Hampankatta with exposed brick interiors and hand-painted murals.
-Famous for its 'All English Breakfast' and sizzling steaks.
-Offers a cozy reading corner and a laid-back atmosphere perfect for remote work.

title: Brick House
sneakPeek: Aesthetic outdoor seating and continental delights.
details:
-Located in Balmatta, known for its beautiful open-air garden seating and fairy lights.
-Specializes in juicy burgers, wood-fired style pizzas, and creamy pastas.
-A highly 'Instagrammable' spot popular with the younger crowd.

title: TLC Art Cafe
sneakPeek: A vibrant cafe for art lovers and bookworms.
details:
-A unique space that combines a cafe with an art gallery.
-Known for its healthy menu options, including vegan cakes and smoothie bowls.
-Regularly hosts workshops, open mic nights, and art exhibitions.

title: The Stairway Bakery & Cafe
sneakPeek: Minimalist aesthetic cafe with great coffee.
details:
-Known for its clean, white minimalist decor and calm ambiance.
-Serves excellent specialty coffee and a variety of continental snacks.
-A popular hangout spot for students and young professionals.

title: BuCo
sneakPeek: A beachside cafe with tropical vibes.
details:
-Located near the beach, offering a relaxed, tropical atmosphere.
-Specializes in burgers, coffee, and fresh baking.
-The open-air setting makes it a perfect spot for sunset snacks.

title: Big Bollywood Adda
sneakPeek: A lively, movie-themed hangout spot.
details:
-Located in Mallikatte, this spot pays tribute to the glitz and glam of Bollywood.
-Features quirky interiors with movie posters and vibrant decor.
-Known for its fusion food, massive burgers, and creative mocktails.

title: Onyx Air Lounge
sneakPeek: Sleek dining with city views and finger food.
details:
-Located in Kodailbail, offering a premium lounge experience with city views.
-Famous for its excellent starters, pizzas, and mocktails.
-The ambiance is modern and chic, perfect for special occasions.

title: The Shake Factory
sneakPeek: The ultimate stop for thick shakes and nachos.
details:
-Located in City Centre Mall, a favorite pit-stop for shoppers.
-Offers a massive variety of customizable thick shakes and slushies.
-Also famous for loaded nachos and spicy fries.

title: Pizza Valley
sneakPeek: Student favorite for wood-fired style pizza.
details:
-A hidden gem in Bendoor, beloved by college students for its prices and taste.
-Known for its wood-fired style pizzas with generous toppings.
-Surprisingly famous for its Sushi menu, which is rare in Mangalore.

title: Spindrift
sneakPeek: Brewpub famous for thin-crust pizzas.
details:
-Located in Bharath Mall, this is one of Mangalore's first microbreweries.
-While it's a pub, their food menu, especially the thin-crust pizzas, is legendary.
-Offers a spacious, dimly lit ambiance with great music.

title: Laziz Pizza
sneakPeek: Pocket-friendly pizzas with a desi twist.
details:
-A popular chain known for affordable and tasty pizzas.
-Offers unique Indian fusion toppings that locals love.
-Great for quick bites and takeaway.

title: Dominos Pizza
sneakPeek: The classic choice for delivery and comfort.
details:
-The world-famous pizza chain with multiple outlets across Mangalore.
-A go-to for familiar tastes like the Farmhouse and Peppy Paneer.
-Known for its 30-minute delivery promise and consistent quality.

title: Pizza Hut
sneakPeek: Famous for Pan Pizzas and Stuffed Crust.
details:
-A global favorite known for its deep-dish Pan Pizzas.
-Popular for its cheesy Stuffed Crust options and pasta.
-A great family dining spot with a relaxed atmosphere.

title: Fiza by Nexus Mall
sneakPeek: The largest mall in Mangalore offering a premium experience.
details:
-Located on Pandeshwar Road, spanning over 0.7 million sq. ft.
-Formerly known as Forum Fiza Mall, it is a favorite shopping destination in coastal Karnataka.
-Features a PVR Multiplex for a premium movie-watching experience.
-Home to international brands like Marks & Spencer, H&M, and Lifestyle.
-Includes a large food court and 'Timezone', a popular gaming zone for kids and families.

title: City Centre Mall
sneakPeek: A vibrant shopping hub in the heart of the city.
details:
-Located strategically on K.S. Rao Road, making it easily accessible from all parts of the city.
-One of the largest malls in the region with over 150 retail stores.
-Features Cinepolis Cinemas, a favorite for movie lovers.
-Offers a wide range of dining options and a Fun City gaming zone for children.
-Known for its massive atrium and distinct architecture.

title: Bharath Mall
sneakPeek: A classic favorite located opposite the KSRTC Bus Stand.
details:
-Situated in Bejai, right across from the KSRTC bus stand, making it a landmark location.
-Features Bharath Cinemas, a home-grown multiplex chain known for good audio quality.
-Houses Decathlon, the first major sports gear outlet in Dakshina Kannada.
-Includes a variety of shopping outlets, a food court, and the popular Bharath Bookmark for stationery lovers.

title: Empire Mall
sneakPeek: A central shopping complex with a popular food court.
details:
-Located centrally on MG Road, one of the busiest streets in Mangalore.
-Known for housing the popular 'Sizzler Ranch' and other dining spots.
-A compact mall that is easy to navigate for quick shopping trips.
-Hosts various local brand outlets and electronics stores.

title: MAK Mall
sneakPeek: Kankanady's shopping hotspot featuring Barbeque Nation.
details:
-Located in Kankanady, MAK Mall is a bustling commercial hub.
-Famous for housing the prestigious Audi showroom and Barbeque Nation.
-Offers a mix of shopping options including Croma for electronics and Bata for footwear.
-Known for its good parking facilities and central location.

title: Saibeen Complex
sneakPeek: A historic shopping favorite in Lalbagh.
details:
-One of Mangalore's earliest shopping complexes, located in Lalbagh.
-A budget-friendly hub for mobile accessories, repairs, and fashion.
-Houses various independent stores, salons, and the popular 'Mobile World'.
-Known as a 'one-stop' destination for varied shopping needs in the city center.

title: Transit One
sneakPeek: A unique theme-based highway mall in Thokkottu.
details:
-Located on NH-66 in Thokkottu, styled as a 'Stop. Recharge. Restart' destination.
-The first theme-based mall in the region, featuring distinctive architecture.
-Offers a curated mix of shopping, dining, and a food court perfect for travelers and locals.
-Known for its 'Old Indian Bazaar' style floor and modern amenities.

title: Inland Ornate
sneakPeek: A boutique commercial hub at Navbharath Circle.
details:
-Located centrally near PVS Circle and Ocean Pearl.
-Home to the popular Domino's Pizza and various travel and education consultancies.
-A well-maintained, compact complex known for its clean interiors and business offices.
-Features specialized boutiques and is a quiet alternative to massive malls.
